articles.title: Google is tracking your movements — even if you tell it not to
articles.description: Google services on Android devices and iPhones store your location data even if you’ve used privacy settings that say they will prevent it from doing so

articles.title: Marijuana to be sold through private retailers, online in Ontario

articles.title: Trump signs bill named for Sen. McCain, doesn't mention him
articles.description: FORT DRUM, N.Y. (AP) — President Donald Trump on Monday signed a $716 billion defense policy bill named for John McCain but included no mention in his remarks of the Republican senator, who is battling brain cancer at home in Arizona. Trump and McCain are eng…

articles.author: Jacob Kastrenakes
articles.title: Court halts FCC plan to revoke low-income internet subsidies on tribal lands
articles.description: The court said the FCC appears to have failed to look at whether residents of tribal lands will have alternative options to get online once these changes are in place or to prove that the changes would not lead to “mass disconnection.”

articles.title: Thousands of Romanians rally against the government and call for the prime minister's resignation
articles.description: Anti-government protesters took to the streets of Romania's capital city, Bucharest, over the weekend following claims of low wages, government corruption and judicial system complaints.

articles.description: Torrential rains triggered flash flooding in parts of central and eastern Pennsylvania on Monday, closing down a heavily traveled interstate.

articles.author: Stephen Culp
articles.title: Wall Street dragged down by fall out from Turkey's plunging lira
articles.description: U.S. stocks dropped on Monday as global jitters from Turkey's plummeting currency spread to Wall Street, with the S&P 500 and the Dow falling for the fourth session in a row.

articles.title: Singer Aretha Franklin said to be 'seriously ill'
articles.description: Fans and friends of Aretha Franklin offer prayers and well wishes after a person close to the star says she is unwell.
